messages.zh: 第二十四关（前）
messages.en: level 24(pre)

messages.zh: 你终于到了，星熊。
messages.en: You’re finally here, Hoshiguma.

messages.zh: 抱歉，被那人拖了太久。
messages.en: Apologies, got delayed by that person for too long.

messages.zh: 你有没有受伤？
messages.en: Are you hurt?

messages.zh: 没有。但确实被吓了一跳。
messages.en: No. But surprised indeed.

messages.zh: 特别督察组加强了对龙门本区的防守。我带出来的这些，就是全部可用的小队了。
messages.en: The Special Inspection Division enhanced the defenses to Lungmen main district. Those that I brought with me are all the squads we can use.

messages.zh: ......特别督察组真的是被她一个人就拦下了吗？
messages.en: ……Was the Special Inspection Division really stopped by her single handedly?

messages.zh: 没亲眼见过之前，我也不敢相信。
messages.en: Before I saw it for myself, I couldn’t believe it either.

messages.zh: 那个家伙，确实有这个水准。
messages.en: That person, does have the skills for that.

messages.zh: 陈长官，这位是......
messages.en: Officer Ch’en, this is……

messages.zh: 特别督察组精英干员星熊。
messages.en: Special Inspection Division, elite operator Hoshiguma.

messages.zh: 你们就是——罗德岛？
messages.en: and you are——Rhodes Island?

messages.zh: 不问别的。现在，你们有什么思路？
messages.en: Other things aside now. What ideas have you got now?

messages.zh: 两位我方的特别行动人员已经探明了劫持者的去向。
messages.en: Two of our specialized operators have discovered the kidnapper’s whereabouts.

messages.zh: 她们正在跟踪这支整合运动，我们可以随她们的指引行动。
messages.en: They’re tracking this group of Reunion Movement now, we can act according to their directions.

messages.zh: 可以啊。老陈，你确实夸在点子上了，这些人是真的在行。
messages.en: Nice. Ch’en, your compliments are well given, these people are really professional at it.

messages.zh: 呵。
messages.en: Heh.

messages.zh: 星熊，召集近卫局所有小队，该行动了。
messages.en: Hoshiguma, gather up all squadrons of the Guard Bureau. Time to move.

messages.zh: 罗德岛，你们带路。
messages.en: Rhodes Island, you lead the way.

messages.zh: ——了解。当然，整合运动似乎留下了一些断后的战斗人员，埋伏在路线上——
messages.en: ——Understood. Of course, Reunion Movement seems to have left some rear guards, hiding along the way.

messages.zh: 这简单。当然我也想看看——罗德岛战斗起来是不是也一样内行！
messages.en: That’s piece of cake. And of course I also want to see——if Rhodes Island is equally professional in battles!
